subsection_content: Varicocele is a common disease in men but is not too dangerous. In fact, up to 15% of adult men have varicocele. Many cases do not pay attention to the disease throughout their lives. The disease may also not cause any problems in the person's life. In adolescents, the incidence of varicocele is 20%. Some can be completely cured without treatment.
subsection_title: gian tinh mach thung tinh.json. Is varicocele dangerous?
subsection_data:
gian tinh mach thung tinh.json. Is varicocele dangerous?
Varicocele is a common disease in men but is not too dangerous. In fact, up to 15% of adult men have varicocele. Many cases do not pay attention to the disease throughout their lives. The disease may also not cause any problems in the person's life. In adolescents, the incidence of varicocele is 20%. Some can be completely cured without treatment.
